remarks: If two neighbors of a specific vertex have a common neighbor in a friendship graph, then this common neighbor must be the specific vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Dec-2017.)
statement:
frgranbnb.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
frgranbnb.nx $e |- D = ( <. V , E >. Neighbors X ) $.
frgranbnb.f $e |- ( ph -> V FriendGrph E ) $.
frgranbnb $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( U e. D /\ W e. D ) /\ U =/= W ) -> ( ( { U , A } e. ran E /\ { W , A } e. ran E ) -> A = X ) ) $.
